str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To have strength, be strong, be in full health and vigor, be able; meton: I prevail. From ischus; to have force.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
From the base of chraomai or chre; employment, i.e. An affair; also occasion, demand, requirement or destitution.
A physician. From iaomai; a physician.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Badly, evilly, wrongly. From kakos; badly.
